<b>Tanja van de Ven</b> (PhD) 
<br><a href="mailto:tanja.vandeven@wits.ac.za">tanja.vandeven@wits.ac.za</a> 
<p style="max-width:230px;text-align:left">Tanja studied the responses of birds to heat during her PhD at the University of Cape Town, under the supervision of Susie Cunningham and Andrew McKechnie.
